Reviews.Title: The worst company ever. Do not buy from them
Reviews.Author: Janmarie
Reviews.Content: Worldwide distributors are the worst company I have ever dealt with!!!!!!  They sold me aa blackberry that did not work and after repeated phone calls and emails, I sent it back to them and thet did not repair it or replace it. I lost 500USD. AND I HAVE NOTHING TO SHOW FOR IT. TOTAL CROOKERY.  CAREFUL!!!

Reviews.Title: my torch phone sucks
Reviews.Author: Olumide
Reviews.Content: can you believe that this phone does not have a facility for sending photos or pictures? i am the only BB user in the whole world who cannot use his device to send pictures. please, avoid this seller. i regret my investment.

Reviews.Title: Blackberry Torch 9800
Reviews.Author: Carlos
Reviews.Content: Undoubtedly one of the best phones I've had in my hands, very fast to surf the Internet, good image quality in photos and mobility through each of your applications is exceptional

Reviews.Title: Thank you so much
Reviews.Author: Joner Montilla
Reviews.Content: Excellent product, very grateful greetings from Venezuela, left very satisfied with the product, very nice and in excellent condition happy day.

Reviews.Title: NOT WORKING
Reviews.Author: hasiba
Reviews.Content: SINCE I BOUGHT THREE TIME I SENT IT TO REPAIRNOT GOODI AM SORRY TO SAY THATDONOT BUY IT
